data.name: SkyStorm Chronicles part 1 Seabeards Treasure
data.detailed_description:
Clay enters the Imaginarium as Kid Space Skull based on his Dad's favorite 1950s comic book. He must enter the deadly maze of Seabeard's castle and the catacombs below to find the old pirates' treasure to get one of the pieces of the Imaginarium map.
Much like games that came before like Hollow Knight, Dead Cells, Metroid Dread SKYSTORM CHRONICLES SEABEARDS TREASURE is a maze of twists and turns that reveals deadly villains from Lighting Bugs to Alien Huntarrs and of course Zombie Pirates.
data.about_the_game:
Clay enters the Imaginarium as Kid Space Skull based on his Dad's favorite 1950s comic book. He must enter the deadly maze of Seabeard's castle and the catacombs below to find the old pirates' treasure to get one of the pieces of the Imaginarium map.
Much like games that came before like Hollow Knight, Dead Cells, Metroid Dread SKYSTORM CHRONICLES SEABEARDS TREASURE is a maze of twists and turns that reveals deadly villains from Lighting Bugs to Alien Huntarrs and of course Zombie Pirates.
data.short_description: A 2D fantasy world based on a successful comic book that offers the player the challenge of finding the hidden treasure of Seabeard the Pirate. Maneuver the maze and beat the boss fights. A fun challenging journey that introduces a unique set of characters and story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 or 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
